{% set num = frappe.db.sql(""" select phone from `tabContact Phone` where parent in (select link_title from `tabDynamic Link` where link_name = %(customer)s and parenttype = 'Contact') limit 1; """, {"customer" : doc.customer} ) %} {% set customer_info = frappe.db.sql(""" SELECT ruc,territory, municipio, address_line1 FROM `tabCustomer` where name = %(customer)s """, {"customer":doc.customer}) %} {% set items = frappe.db.sql("""select * from vista_planes_facturas where name = %(name)s and descripcion not in ('GponTv22','ITV22');""",{"name": doc.name}) %} {% set collector = frappe.db.sql(""" select name, telefono from vista_colector where link_name = %(customer)s limit 1;""", {"customer":doc.customer}) %}
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.name}}

Nombre: {{ (doc.customer_name|replace("/","")).upper() }}
Telefono: {%if num%}{{num[0][0]}}{%endif%}
RUC: {%if customer_info[0][0]%}{{customer_info[0][0]}}{%else%} {%endif%}
Departamento: {%if customer_info[0][1]%}{{(customer_info[0][1]).upper()}}{%else%} {%endif%}
Municipio: {%if customer_info[0][2]%}{{(customer_info[0][2]|replace("Mun", "")).upper()}}{%else%} {%endif%}
Direccion: {%if customer_info[0][3]%}{{ (customer_info[0][3]).upper() }}{%else%} {%endif%}
